Wrath upon Dragons.name: Wrath upon Dragons
Wrath upon Dragons.flavor: A blast of pure force erupts from you in all directions, ravaging your foes.
Wrath upon Dragons.onHit: 1d12 + Wisdom modifier force damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. If the target is a dragon, it is instead dazed and takes a -4 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Wrath upon Dragons.onMiss: Half damage. If target is a dragon, it also takes a -4 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Primal Bottle.name: Primal Bottle
Primal Bottle.flavor: Even as the dragonâ€™s flames dance around you, you raise your holy symbol and command them to fall back.
Primal Bottle.trigger: A creature makes a close attack that includes you
Primal Bottle.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to all defenses against close attacks until the end of your next turn. You take no damage if the attack misses.

Fire with Fire.name: Fire with Fire
Fire with Fire.flavor: As though stealing power from the dragon itself, you breathe a blast of destructive energy and take to the air, sprouting great draconic wings.
keywords: Divine, Implement ; Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison or Thunder
Fire with Fire.onHit: 3d10 + Wis modifier acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder damage.
Fire with Fire.effect: You gain draconic wings that provide you with fly 5 (hover) until the end of the encounter.
